backend/main.mo: Actor handling access control, user profiles, page content, pricing entries, and CSR info with permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing high-level summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/ic-assets.json: Asset config specifying inclusion of the .well-known directory.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with German SEO metadata, Plausible analytics, and root mount point.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Domain verification file listing allowed domains for Internet Computer configuration.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing all site URLs with metadata including the new Zurich landing page.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app file configuring TanStack Router routes including the hidden Zurich landing page.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout component with header, navigation excluding the Zurich page, mobile menu, and footer.
frontend/src/components/MobileReadMore.t: Collapsible mobile content component controlled by feature flags for compacting behavior.
frontend/src/config/featureFlags.ts: Feature flag definitions controlling optional behaviors like mobile read-more compacting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines hooks for fetching CSR metadata and generating a new CSR using Web Crypto, including ASN.1 construction and PEM output.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom color variables, light/dark mode themes, and global styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page for Roland Soder and sets SEO metadata such as title, description, canonical link, and Open Graph tags.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact and booking page with hero text, contact options, and SEO metadata setup.
frontend/src/pages/CouplesPage.tsx: Displays the couples coaching page with hero section, expandable info, booking button, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/CSRGeneratorPage.tsx: Provides a UI to auto-generate, display, copy, and download CSRs and public keys, with DNS checks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/DomainVerificationPag: Fetches and verifies the IC domain configuration file and displays the verification status and file details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with hero content, structured data, and extensive SEO and social metadata injection.
frontend/src/pages/LegalPage.tsx: Shows the legal information page including impressum, contact details, and liability/disclaimer sections.
frontend/src/pages/MenPage.tsx: React page for men's relationship coaching with SEO meta tags, hero content, and call-to-action elements.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Pricing page defining metadata, FAQs, and pricing details for coaching services with SEO and structured UI components.
frontend/src/pages/SitemapPage.tsx: Renders a human-readable XML sitemap page using predefined URLs, metadata, and dynamic last-modified dates.
frontend/src/pages/TechnicalStatusPage.t: Runs client-side technical checks (DNS, SSL, redirects, analytics, domain resolution) and displays diagnostic results.
frontend/src/pages/WomenPage.tsx: React page for women's relationship coaching with SEO setup, hero text, and call-to-action buttons.
frontend/src/pages/ZurichCouplesLandingP: Landing page targeting ZÃ¼rich couples with SEO metadata, hero content, and sections describing benefits of online coaching.
frontend/src/types/calendly.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file reserved for Calendly-related type definitions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, requirements, and features for creating an unlinked Zurich-focused landing page with SEO, CTA, and routing details.
